Utilities¶

A collection of utility functions useful for Samplers.

Functions¶

ising_energy(h, J, sample) Calculate the Ising energy of the given sample.
qubo_energy(Q, sample) Calculate the quadratic polynomial value of the given sample to a quadratic unconstrained binary optimization (QUBO) problem.
ising_to_qubo(h, J) Converts an Ising problem to a QUBO problem.
qubo_to_ising(Q) Converts a QUBO problem to an Ising problem.
